mapper.update: UPDATE sys_register_service SET STATUS='2' WHERE NOW()>(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE,'%Y:%c:%d'),DATE_FORMAT(end_time,' %k:%i:%s')),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s')) and STATUS!='2'

UPDATE patient_register_service prs, sys_doctor d, sys_register_service r SET prs.STATUS='2', prs.allowance = d.subsidy WHERE d.id = r.sys_doctor_id and r.id = prs.sys_register_service_id and prs.sys_register_service_id IN (SELECT id FROM sys_register_service WHERE NOW()>(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE,'%Y:%c:%d'), DATE_FORMAT(end_time,' %k:%i:%s')),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s'))) AND prs.status='1'
UPDATE patient_register_service prs SET prs.status='6' WHERE prs.status='0' AND NOW()>(DATE_ADD((DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s')), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE))

UPDATE sys_register_service srs SET srs.status='0' WHERE srs.id IN (SELECT prs.sys_register_service_id FROM patient_register_service prs WHERE prs.status='0' AND NOW()>(DATE_ADD((DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s')), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE)))
mapper.select: SELECT srs.begin_time, srs.date, prs.id AS patient_register_service_id, prs.sys_patient_id AS patientid, prs.register_no, prs.phone as userPhone, su. NAME AS doctorName, su.phone, prs.babyName, case when shc.contact_phone is null then "" else shc.contact_phone end hospitalContactPhone, sm.id, su.openid, sh.`name` as hospitalName FROM sys_register_service srs INNER JOIN patient_register_service prs ON prs.sys_register_service_id = srs.id LEFT JOIN sys_hospital_contact shc on shc.sys_hospital_id = srs.sys_hospital_id RIGHT JOIN sys_doctor sd ON sd.id = srs.sys_doctor_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sd.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_monitor sm ON sm.patient_register_service_id = prs.id LEFT JOIN sys_hospital sh on srs.sys_hospital_id = sh.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(prs.create_date,"%Y-%m-%d") AND DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(srs.date,"%Y-%m-%d") AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE) > prs.create_date AND prs.STATUS = '1' AND sm.types = '1' AND sm.status = '7'

select prs.babyName, case when shc.contact_phone is null then "" else shc.contact_phone end hospitalContactPhone, case when shc.sys_hospital_name is null then "" else shc.sys_hospital_name end hospitalName, DATE_FORMAT(srs.begin_time,"%H:%i") begin_time,su.name AS doctorName, su.phone,sm.id, case when su.openid is null then "" else su.openid end from patient_register_service prs INNER JOIN sys_register_service srs on prs.sys_register_service_id = srs.id RIGHT JOIN sys_doctor sd ON sd.id = srs.sys_doctor_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sd.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_hospital_contact shc on shc.sys_hospital_id = srs.sys_hospital_id LEFT JOIN sys_monitor sm ON sm.patient_register_service_id = prs.id where prs. STATUS = '1' AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(srs.date,INTERVAL 1 DAY),"%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y-%m-%d") AND sm.`status` = '7' AND sm.`types` = '1' ORDER BY srs.begin_time

STATUS = '1' AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(srs.date,INTERVAL 1 DAY),"%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y-%m-%d") AND sm.`status` = '7' AND sm.`types` = '1' ORDER BY srs.begin_time

select su.openid openid,sd.* FROM sys_user su, sys_doctor sd, sys_register_service srs, patient_register_service prs WHERE su.id=sd.sys_user_id AND sd.id = srs.sys_doctor_id AND srs.id = prs.sys_register_service_id AND prs.status!="0" AND prs.status!="1" and prs.status!="6" AND srs.date=#{date} GROUP BY sd.id
